metadata.name: human, kind
metadata.description:
The first poem to be released as part of the "Ten" collection  
by Luke Dogwalker.  
Each poem is minted in 5 "editions" which have their own unique traits beyond the words themselves,  
balancing the line between multiple editions and 1/1. 

All collectors are invited to join me on Twitter @_lukedogwalker  
and or Instagram @lukedogwalker  
places where our little pack will live for now.  
With these first few steps into the NFT space I hope to share and give back as much as been given to me, in terms of kindness and guidance.

Poem reads:

"human, kind"

may I greet today 
for that which it is,  
and unmerited gift granted  
despite the many I've taken for--

may I always be kind;  
bring warmth to the wicked,  
hear voice of the hushed,  
give attention and sight to unseen.

may I always be curious;  
embrace and explore  
with wonder and awe  
the very tools with which I was born.

and may I get into mischief--  
balance the beam between  
what may be sensible and  
what may be preposterous--

I've looked out--and now  
looking in, from the edge of what is,  
I see a world which could be  
a new tradition
